original: Naparittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… namahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naappamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na parittam dhammam paṭicca pe na mahaggatam dhammam paṭicca pe na appamāṇam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā bāttiṁsa, ārammaṇe sattavīsa, adhipatiyā sattavīsa …pe… aññamaññe tiṁsa …pe… purejāte āsevane catuvīsa …pe… avigate bāttiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā bāttisa ārammaṇe sattavīsa adhipatiyā sattavīsa pe aññamaññe tisa pe purejāte āsevane catuvīsa pe avigate bāttisa
